concepts.definition: A storage status in which a document is available on-line.

concept.definition: A storage status in which a document is available on-line and is also stored off-line for long-term access.

concepts.definition: A storage status in which a document is available on-line and is also stored off-line for long-term access.
A storage status in which a document has been stored off-line for long-term access.
A storage status in which a document is no longer available in this system.

valueset.name: v3.DocumentStorage
valueset.description: Identifies the storage status of a document.

allowed_values.description: A storage status in which a document is available on-line.
A storage status in which a document has been stored off-line for long-term access.
A storage status in which a document is no longer available in this system.
